pages.title: Helping Farmed Animals
pages.description: Humans are outnumbered by non-human animals in factory farms.

pages.title: Global Health
pages.description: Humans on Earth face many health challenges. However, some of the most wide-spread sources of suffering and death are easily prevented or treated. Many cost-effective charities focus on delivering these interventions.
